trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""> </xref> händelsen för den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> events pass an instance of AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: När de aktiveras den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>händelser skickas en förekomst av AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs till hanteraren för den associerade händelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen hämtar nya nivån för indata när den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Den `AudioLevel` -egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser innehåller den aktuella nivån för ljudinsignal till taligenkänningsmotorn.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar nya andelen ljudinsignal efter den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"> </xref> händelsen inträffar.

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
